channel.title: Read! Need help with prayer!
channel.description:
Hi, what codes should I add for fully working prayer?
And where should I add it?
I have looked in the tutorials, but they do not work for me.
Can someone please help me?

item.title: Read! Need help with prayer!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Well, thanks anyways.

Right now I just need a code.

I always try to learn by reading other people’s codes and seeing what they do for what commands.

Read full topic

item.title: Read! Need help with prayer!
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Make percentages with numeric variables and operators. Increase max hit depending on percent (for boosting-prayers). For protect-prayers, make a String return method to check the type of attack the opponent is attacking with, and deal with the problem depending on which protect-prayer is switched on. To get rid of client work, I recommend making commands to turn different prayers on and off and add a timer to act as if it is draining their prayer points.

Read full topic
